location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省岳阳市平江县
location.en: Pingjiang County, Yueyang, Hunan, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省岳阳市平江县的行政管理机关。
description.en: The administrative organ of Pingjiang County, Yueyang City, Hunan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，自2021年10月起担任平江县人民政府县长。
description.en: Chinese politician, serving as the County Magistrate of the Pingjiang County People's Government since October 2021.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾于2004年12月至2007年1月期间担任平江县人民政府县长。
description.en: Chinese politician, who served as the County Magistrate of the Pingjiang County People's Government from December 2004 to January 2007.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾于2007年1月至2013年3月期间担任平江县人民政府县长。
description.en: Chinese politician, who served as the County Magistrate of the Pingjiang County People's Government from January 2007 to March 2013.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾于2013年3月至2014年10月期间担任平江县人民政府县长。
description.en: Chinese politician, who served as the County Magistrate of the Pingjiang County People's Government from March 2013 to October 2014.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾于2014年10月至2021年8月期间担任平江县人民政府县长。
description.en: Chinese politician, who served as the County Magistrate of the Pingjiang County People's Government from October 2014 to August 2021.

location.en: Yueyang, Hunan, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省岳阳市的行政管理机关。
description.en: The administrative organ of Yueyang City, Hunan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.en: The local state power organ of Pingjiang County, Yueyang City, Hunan Province, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党平江县人民政府党组

zh-cn: 中国共产党平江县人民政府党组

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在平江县人民政府中设立的领导机构。
description.en: The leading party group of the Chinese Communist Party established within the Pingjiang County People's Government.

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省岳阳市
location.en: Yueyang, Hunan, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省岳阳市下辖的一个县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Yueyang City, Hunan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 彭方建于2021年10月就任平江县人民政府县长。
description.en: Peng Fangjian took office as the County Magistrate of the Pingjiang County People's Government in October 2021.

description.zh-cn: 彭先政于2004年12月至2007年1月期间担任平江县人民政府县长。
description.en: Peng Xianzheng served as the County Magistrate of the Pingjiang County People's Government from December 2004 to January 2007.

description.zh-cn: 王洪斌于2007年1月至2013年3月期间担任平江县人民政府县长。
description.en: Wang Hongbin served as the County Magistrate of the Pingjiang County People's Government from January 2007 to March 2013.

description.zh-cn: 谢春生于2013年3月至2014年10月期间担任平江县人民政府县长。
description.en: Xie Chunsheng served as the County Magistrate of the Pingjiang County People's Government from March 2013 to October 2014.

description.zh-cn: 黄伟雄于2014年10月至2021年8月期间担任平江县人民政府县长。
description.en: Huang Weixiong served as the County Magistrate of the Pingjiang County People's Government from October 2014 to August 2021.

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框，平江县人民政府的业务上级机构是岳阳市人民政府。
description.en: According to the infobox, the operational superior of the Pingjiang County People's Government is the Yueyang Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框，平江县人民政府的组织上级机构是平江县人民代表大会，政府对人大负责。
description.en: According to the infobox, the organizational superior of the Pingjiang County People's Government is the Pingjiang County People's Congress, to which the government is accountable.

relationships.target: 平江县人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框，平江县人民政府的组织上级机构是平江县人民代表大会常务委员会，在人大闭会期间，政府对人大常委会负责。
description.en: According to the infobox, the organizational superior of the Pingjiang County People's Government is the Standing Committee of the Pingjiang County People's Congress, to which the government is accountable when the Congress is not in session.

relationships.source: 中国共产党平江县人民政府党组

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框，中国共产党平江县人民政府党组是中共在平江县人民政府内设置的本级组织。
description.en: According to the infobox, the CCP Pingjiang County People's Government Party Group is the local-level CCP organization established within the Pingjiang County People's Government.
